column4: help: i need to free up some space, but deleting files does nothing. any ideas?
help: i need to free up some space, but deleting files does nothing. any ideas?
did yo empty your trashcan ?
I'm having a minor issue whre usb devices won't unmount
same here... that is, if i can get them to mount in the first part
with me it is only with my brand new mp3 player ,  it doesn  the sync part but it seems to fail at the end unmount and tells me it cannot be unmounted
what kind of mp3 player? creative?
no the new line of RCA Lyra  Pearl  TC1102A  new as of noon today
ah.
my previous one worked fine  RCA Lyra TC1001  and my sandisk usb flash drive works fine
It tells me there is not mount point when unmounting as if the automount point was being removed before the unmounting was over
yeah, same here... or at least something like that
I'm waiting to finish my current autiobook to check again  , I have a few more minutes to go and I will get the exact error msg and check the forum
alright
you need to use something like avidemux to  resync the sound
workflow ?
you can do that in avidemux it'S another app, you can use it to ... offset the audio when you resave the file
to be frank I've never done this before , but I've needed to fix some small vids
pretty much, on the left side of the image in avidemux you can change the audio format ( from copy to soemething else) and you get access to filters,  what you need should be in there somwehre
yeah, took me a while to figure that one out,  you get access to a butload of filters editing tools and assorted features when you choose something other then copy
